title: Deck of war
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Miscellaneous item                                                        |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | deck of war                                                               |
| Icon | [![Deck of war.png](/images/4/4a/Deck_of_war.png)](/File:Deck_of_war.png) |

|   |                                                                    |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A deck of magical cards which are useful before and during battle. |

The **deck of war** selects its cards from the [archetype decks](/Decks#Archetype_decks "Decks") across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the [physical deck](/Decks#Composition "Decks") are not all equal.

| pre-[0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                                                                                     | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                           | [trunk](/Trunk "Trunk")                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") [Enchantments](/Deck_of_enchantments "Deck of enchantments") [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [Transport](/Deck_of_transport "Deck of transport") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") [Enchantments](/Deck_of_enchantments "Deck of enchantments") [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [Transport](/Deck_of_transport "Deck of transport") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") |

The possible cards across versions in this deck are shown in the table below.

| pre-[0.14](/0.14 "0.14") Deck of war

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Miscellaneous item
Name deck of war
Icon
A deck of magical cards which are useful before and during battle.

The deck of war selects its cards from the archetype decks across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the physical deck are not all equal.

pre-0.14 0.14 0.15 0.16 trunk

Enchantments
Summoning
